name: The Gek Eventure
description:
A group of childhood friends discover a portal that leads to other worlds completely different from their own. The adventurous group enters thinking this is a fun activity for the day, but once they enter, it's much more than they originally anticipated. Join this group of friends on their journey to learn more!

This is the first part of this story, The Nays, so make sure to start with this one! This series has over 100 parts written, but they're in the process of being converted into Twine stories, so make sure to follow this account for updates on when the next entries will come.

As a side note, 2022 is the 20 year anniversary of this story, The Nays. So as celebration, this first part is finally being uploaded here!
